newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-BARCELONA DENY INTEREST IN NEWCASTLE'S GINOLA.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BARCELONA DENY INTEREST IN NEWCASTLE'S GINOLA.

text.p: Barcelona have denied reports that they are interested in signing Newcastle United's French forward David Ginola.
"There is nothing in it," a Barcelona club source said on Tuesday. "The club looked at signing him in the close season but in the end he was considered too expensive,"
Several Spanish newspapers reported a transfer was possible after Ginola's agent was seen in the president's box at Barcelona's game against Atletico Madrid on Saturday.
